description:
The Phantom Knight uses the Hell Ring to multiply his strength. After being surrounded by Mist Flames, he appears in an unexpected form and displays his dark powers. But Tsuna fearlessly sets out to use his secret technique--a flame attack with force never seen before—the X Burner Hyper Explosion!! The flames clash. Who will win the battle?! And what was beyond the wall that was destroyed by the fierce clash of power?
Source: crunchyroll
